name: .CBDDLP
summary: Learn about .CBDDLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CBDDLP file with Chitubox Basic (available for free) or Chitubox Pro (available as a free trial). To do so:
Select Chitubox's sandwich menu (located in the program's upper-left corner).
Navigate to and open your CBDDLP file.
After opening your CBDDLP file in Chitubox, you can transfer the file to a connected 3D printer, edit the model(s) the file contains, or convert the file to another sliced 3D model format.
To convert a CBDDLP file to another sliced 3D model format:
Click Back, then Slice, then Save.
You'll then be able to save your CBDDLP file in any of the slicing formats listed here.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .cbddlp file in Chitubox
images.caption: CBDDLP file open in Chitubox
